00001                         /* Sparse matrices in compressed column-oriented form */
00002 #include "Csparse.h"
00003 #include "chm_common.h"
00004 
00005 SEXP Csparse_validate(SEXP x)
00006 {
00007     /* NB: we do *NOT* check a potential 'x' slot here, at all */
00008     SEXP pslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym),
00009         islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00010     Rboolean sorted, strictly;
00011     int j, k,
00012         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00013         nrow = dims[0],
00014         ncol = dims[1],
00015         *xp = INTEGER(pslot),
00016         *xi = INTEGER(islot);
00017 
00018     if (length(pslot) != dims[1] + 1)
00019         return mkString(_("slot p must have length = ncol(.) + 1"));
00020     if (xp[0] != 0)
00021         return mkString(_("first element of slot p must be zero"));
00022     if (length(islot) < xp[ncol]) /* allow larger slots from over-allocation!*/
00023         return
00024             mkString(_("last element of slot p must match length of slots i and x"));
00025     for (j = 0; j < length(islot); j++) {
00026         if (xi[j] < 0 || xi[j] >= nrow)
00027             return mkString(_("all row indices must be between 0 and nrow-1"));
00028     }
00029     sorted = TRUE; strictly = TRUE;
00030     for (j = 0; j < ncol; j++) {
00031         if (xp[j] > xp[j+1])
00032             return mkString(_("slot p must be non-decreasing"));
00033         if(sorted)
00034             for (k = xp[j] + 1; k < xp[j + 1]; k++) {
00035                 if (xi[k] < xi[k - 1])
00036                     sorted = FALSE;
00037                 else if (xi[k] == xi[k - 1])
00038                     strictly = FALSE;
00039             }
00040     }
00041     if (!sorted) {
00042         CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00043         R_CheckStack();
00044 
00045         cholmod_sort(chx, &c);
00046         /* Now re-check that row indices are *strictly* increasing
00047          * (and not just increasing) within each column : */
00048         for (j = 0; j < ncol; j++) {
00049             for (k = xp[j] + 1; k < xp[j + 1]; k++)
00050                 if (xi[k] == xi[k - 1])
00051                     return mkString(_("slot i is not *strictly* increasing inside a column (even after cholmod_sort)"));
00052         }
00053 
00054     } else if(!strictly) {  /* sorted, but not strictly */
00055         return mkString(_("slot i is not *strictly* increasing inside a column"));
00056     }
00057     return ScalarLogical(1);
00058 }
00059 
00060 SEXP Rsparse_validate(SEXP x)
00061 {
00062     /* NB: we do *NOT* check a potential 'x' slot here, at all */
00063     SEXP pslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym),
00064         jslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym);
00065     Rboolean sorted, strictly;
00066     int i, k,
00067         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00068         nrow = dims[0],
00069         ncol = dims[1],
00070         *xp = INTEGER(pslot),
00071         *xj = INTEGER(jslot);
00072 
00073     if (length(pslot) != dims[0] + 1)
00074         return mkString(_("slot p must have length = nrow(.) + 1"));
00075     if (xp[0] != 0)
00076         return mkString(_("first element of slot p must be zero"));
00077     if (length(jslot) < xp[nrow]) /* allow larger slots from over-allocation!*/
00078         return
00079             mkString(_("last element of slot p must match length of slots j and x"));
00080     for (i = 0; i < length(jslot); i++) {
00081         if (xj[i] < 0 || xj[i] >= ncol)
00082             return mkString(_("all column indices must be between 0 and ncol-1"));
00083     }
00084     sorted = TRUE; strictly = TRUE;
00085     for (i = 0; i < nrow; i++) {
00086         if (xp[i] > xp[i+1])
00087             return mkString(_("slot p must be non-decreasing"));
00088         if(sorted)
00089             for (k = xp[i] + 1; k < xp[i + 1]; k++) {
00090                 if (xj[k] < xj[k - 1])
00091                     sorted = FALSE;
00092                 else if (xj[k] == xj[k - 1])
00093                     strictly = FALSE;
00094             }
00095     }
00096     if (!sorted)
00097         /* cannot easily use cholmod_sort(.) ... -> "error out" :*/
00098         return mkString(_("slot j is not increasing inside a column"));
00099     else if(!strictly) /* sorted, but not strictly */
00100         return mkString(_("slot j is not *strictly* increasing inside a column"));
00101 
00102     return ScalarLogical(1);
00103 }

00107 /* Can only return [dln]geMatrix (no symm/triang);
00108  * FIXME: replace by non-CHOLMOD code ! */
00109 SEXP Csparse_to_dense(SEXP x)
00110 {
00111     CHM_SP chxs = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00112     /* This loses the symmetry property, since cholmod_dense has none,
00113      * BUT, much worse (FIXME!), it also transforms CHOLMOD_PATTERN ("n") matrices
00114      * to numeric (CHOLMOD_REAL) ones : */
00115     CHM_DN chxd = cholmod_sparse_to_dense(chxs, &c);
00116     int Rkind = (chxs->xtype == CHOLMOD_PATTERN)? -1 : Real_kind(x);
00117     R_CheckStack();
00118 
00119     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(chxd, 1, Rkind, GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00120 }

00122 SEXP Csparse_to_nz_pattern(SEXP x, SEXP tri)
00123 {
00124     CHM_SP chxs = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00125     CHM_SP chxcp = cholmod_copy(chxs, chxs->stype, CHOLMOD_PATTERN, &c);
00126     int tr = asLogical(tri);
00127     R_CheckStack();
00128 
00129     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chxcp, 1/*do_free*/,
00130                               tr ? ((*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1) : 0,
00131                               0, tr ? diag_P(x) : "",
00132                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00133 }
00134 
00135 SEXP Csparse_to_matrix(SEXP x)
00136 {
00137     return chm_dense_to_matrix(cholmod_sparse_to_dense(AS_CHM_SP(x), &c),
00138                                1 /*do_free*/, GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00139 }

00141 SEXP Csparse_to_Tsparse(SEXP x, SEXP tri)
00142 {
00143     CHM_SP chxs = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00144     CHM_TR chxt = cholmod_sparse_to_triplet(chxs, &c);
00145     int tr = asLogical(tri);
00146     int Rkind = (chxs->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00147     R_CheckStack();
00148 
00149     return chm_triplet_to_SEXP(chxt, 1,
00150                                tr ? ((*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1) : 0,
00151                                Rkind, tr ? diag_P(x) : "",
00152                                GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00153 }

00155 /* this used to be called  sCMatrix_to_gCMatrix(..)   [in ./dsCMatrix.c ]: */
00156 SEXP Csparse_symmetric_to_general(SEXP x)
00157 {
00158     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x), chgx;
00159     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00160     R_CheckStack();
00161 
00162     if (!(chx->stype))
00163         error(_("Nonsymmetric matrix in Csparse_symmetric_to_general"));
00164     chgx = cholmod_copy(chx, /* stype: */ 0, chx->xtype, &c);
00165     /* xtype: pattern, "real", complex or .. */
00166     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chgx, 1, 0, Rkind, "",
00167                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00168 }

00170 SEXP Csparse_general_to_symmetric(SEXP x, SEXP uplo)
00171 {
00172     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x), chgx;
00173     int uploT = (*CHAR(asChar(uplo)) == 'U') ? 1 : -1;
00174     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00175     R_CheckStack();
00176 
00177     chgx = cholmod_copy(chx, /* stype: */ uploT, chx->xtype, &c);
00178     /* xtype: pattern, "real", complex or .. */
00179     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chgx, 1, 0, Rkind, "",
00180                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00181 }
00182 
00183 SEXP Csparse_transpose(SEXP x, SEXP tri)
00184 {
00185     /* TODO: lgCMatrix & igC* currently go via double prec. cholmod -
00186      *       since cholmod (& cs) lacks sparse 'int' matrices */
00187     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00188     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00189     CHM_SP chxt = cholmod_transpose(chx, chx->xtype, &c);
00190     SEXP dn = PROTECT(duplicate(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym))), tmp;
00191     int tr = asLogical(tri);
00192     R_CheckStack();
00193 
00194     tmp = VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0);    /* swap the dimnames */
00195     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0, VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1));
00196     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1, tmp);
00197     UNPROTECT(1);
00198     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chxt, 1, /* SWAP 'uplo' for triangular */
00199                               tr ? ((*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? -1 : 1) : 0,
00200                               Rkind, tr ? diag_P(x) : "", dn);
00201 }
00202 
00203 SEXP Csparse_Csparse_prod(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00204 {
00205     CHM_SP cha = AS_CHM_SP(a), chb = AS_CHM_SP(b);
00206     CHM_SP chc = cholmod_ssmult(cha, chb, 0, cha->xtype, 1, &c);
00207     SEXP dn = allocVector(VECSXP, 2);
00208     R_CheckStack();
00209 
00210     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00211                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 0)));
00212     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1,
00213                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 1)));
00214     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chc, 1, 0, 0, "", dn);
00215 }
00216 
00217 SEXP Csparse_Csparse_crossprod(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP trans)
00218 {
00219     int tr = asLogical(trans);
00220     CHM_SP cha = AS_CHM_SP(a), chb = AS_CHM_SP(b), chTr, chc;
00221     SEXP dn = allocVector(VECSXP, 2);
00222     R_CheckStack();
00223 
00224     chTr = cholmod_transpose((tr) ? chb : cha, chb->xtype, &c);
00225     chc = cholmod_ssmult((tr) ? cha : chTr, (tr) ? chTr : chb,
00226                          0, cha->xtype, 1, &c);
00227     cholmod_free_sparse(&chTr, &c);
00228 
00229     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00230                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimNamesSym), (tr) ? 0 : 1)));
00231     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1,
00232                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimNamesSym), (tr) ? 0 : 1)));
00233     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chc, 1, 0, 0, "", dn);
00234 }
00235 
00236 SEXP Csparse_dense_prod(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00237 {
00238     CHM_SP cha = AS_CHM_SP(a);
00239     SEXP b_M = PROTECT(mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00240     CHM_DN chb = AS_CHM_DN(b_M);
00241     CHM_DN chc = cholmod_allocate_dense(cha->nrow, chb->ncol, cha->nrow,
00242                                         chb->xtype, &c);
00243     SEXP dn = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00244     double one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00245     R_CheckStack();
00246 
00247     cholmod_sdmult(cha, 0, one, zero, chb, chc, &c);
00248     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00249                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 0)));
00250     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1,
00251                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(b_M, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 1)));
00252     UNPROTECT(2);
00253     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(chc, 1, 0, dn);
00254 }
00255 
00256 SEXP Csparse_dense_crossprod(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00257 {
00258     CHM_SP cha = AS_CHM_SP(a);
00259     SEXP b_M = PROTECT(mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00260     CHM_DN chb = AS_CHM_DN(b_M);
00261     CHM_DN chc = cholmod_allocate_dense(cha->ncol, chb->ncol, cha->ncol,
00262                                         chb->xtype, &c);
00263     SEXP dn = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00264     double one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00265     R_CheckStack();
00266 
00267     cholmod_sdmult(cha, 1, one, zero, chb, chc, &c);
00268     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00269                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 1)));
00270     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1,
00271                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(b_M, Matrix_DimNamesSym), 1)));
00272     UNPROTECT(2);
00273     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(chc, 1, 0, dn);
00274 }
00275 
00276 /* Computes   x'x  or  x x'  -- see Csparse_Csparse_crossprod above for  x'y and x y' */
00277 SEXP Csparse_crossprod(SEXP x, SEXP trans, SEXP triplet)
00278 {
00279     int trip = asLogical(triplet),
00280         tr   = asLogical(trans); /* gets reversed because _aat is tcrossprod */
00281     CHM_TR cht = trip ? AS_CHM_TR(x) : (CHM_TR) NULL;
00282     CHM_SP chcp, chxt,
00283         chx = trip ? cholmod_triplet_to_sparse(cht, cht->nnz, &c) : AS_CHM_SP(x);
00284     SEXP dn = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00285     R_CheckStack();
00286 
00287     if (!tr) chxt = cholmod_transpose(chx, chx->xtype, &c);
00288     chcp = cholmod_aat((!tr) ? chxt : chx, (int *) NULL, 0, chx->xtype, &c);
00289     if(!chcp) error(_("Csparse_crossprod(): error return from cholmod_aat()"));
00290     cholmod_band_inplace(0, chcp->ncol, chcp->xtype, chcp, &c);
00291     chcp->stype = 1;
00292     if (trip) cholmod_free_sparse(&chx, &c);
00293     if (!tr) cholmod_free_sparse(&chxt, &c);
00294     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0,       /* establish dimnames */
00295                    duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym),
00296                                         (tr) ? 0 : 1)));
00297     SET_VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1, duplicate(VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0)));
00298     UNPROTECT(1);
00299     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chcp, 1, 0, 0, "", dn);
00300 }

00302 SEXP Csparse_drop(SEXP x, SEXP tol)
00303 {
00304     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00305     CHM_SP ans = cholmod_copy(chx, chx->stype, chx->xtype, &c);
00306     double dtol = asReal(tol);
00307     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00308     R_CheckStack();
00309 
00310     if(!cholmod_drop(dtol, ans, &c))
00311         error(_("cholmod_drop() failed"));
00312     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(ans, 1, 0, Rkind, "",
00313                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00314 }

00318     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x), chy = AS_CHM_SP(y);

00321 
00322     /* FIXME: currently drops dimnames */
00323     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cholmod_horzcat(chx, chy, 1, &c),
00324                               1, 0, Rkind, "", R_NilValue);

00338 SEXP Csparse_band(SEXP x, SEXP k1, SEXP k2)
00339 {
00340     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00341     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00342     CHM_SP ans = cholmod_band(chx, asInteger(k1), asInteger(k2), chx->xtype, &c);
00343     R_CheckStack();
00344 
00345     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(ans, 1, 0, Rkind, "",
00346                               GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00347 }

00349 SEXP Csparse_diagU2N(SEXP x)
00350 {
00351     if (*diag_P(x) != 'U') {/* "trivially fast" when there's no 'diag' slot at all */
00352         return (x);
00353     }
00354     else {
00355         CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00356         CHM_SP eye = cholmod_speye(chx->nrow, chx->ncol, chx->xtype, &c);
00357         double one[] = {1, 0};
00358         CHM_SP ans = cholmod_add(chx, eye, one, one, TRUE, TRUE, &c);
00359         int uploT = (*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1;
00360         int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00361 
00362         R_CheckStack();
00363         cholmod_free_sparse(&eye, &c);
00364         return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(ans, 1, uploT, Rkind, "N",
00365                                   GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00366     }
00367 }
00368 
00369 SEXP Csparse_submatrix(SEXP x, SEXP i, SEXP j)
00370 {
00371     CHM_SP chx = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00372     int rsize = (isNull(i)) ? -1 : LENGTH(i),
00373         csize = (isNull(j)) ? -1 : LENGTH(j);
00374     int Rkind = (chx->xtype != CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? Real_kind(x) : 0;
00375     R_CheckStack();
00376 
00377     if (rsize >= 0 && !isInteger(i))
00378         error(_("Index i must be NULL or integer"));
00379     if (csize >= 0 && !isInteger(j))
00380         error(_("Index j must be NULL or integer"));
00381 
00382     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cholmod_submatrix(chx, INTEGER(i), rsize,
00383                                                 INTEGER(j), csize,
00384                                                 TRUE, TRUE, &c),
00385                               1, 0, Rkind, "",
00386                               /* FIXME: drops dimnames */ R_NilValue);
00387 }

00389 SEXP Csparse_MatrixMarket(SEXP x, SEXP fname)
00390 {
00391     FILE *f = fopen(CHAR(asChar(fname)), "w");
00392 
00393     if (!f)
00394         error(_("failure to open file \"%s\" for writing"),
00395               CHAR(asChar(fname)));
00396     if (!cholmod_write_sparse(f, AS_CHM_SP(x), (CHM_SP)NULL,
00397                               (char*) NULL, &c))
00398         error(_("cholmod_write_sparse returned error code"));
00399     fclose(f);
00400     return R_NilValue;
00401 }
